# Nicholas Reynolds

I'm a labor and health economist at the University of Essex.

Much of my research focuses on the health and human capital of Americans and innovation.

## News {#news}
- **2025 | AER: Insights lead article.** [The Broad Decline in Health and Human Capital of Americans Born after 1947](https://www.aeaweb.org/articles?id=10.1257/aeri.20230588).
- **2025 | AEA Featured Chart.** Figure 1 selected as an [AEA Featured Chart](https://www.aeaweb.org/research/chart/american-health-capital-decline).
- **Oct 2025 | LSE Business Review.** [What caused the American decline of the past 60 years?](https://blogs.lse.ac.uk/businessreview/2025/10/21/what-caused-the-american-decline-of-the-past-60-years/).
- **Aug 2024 | Commentary.** [Marginal Revolution](https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/08/was-the-great-stagnation-originally-a-problem-of-human-capital.html) and [Bloomberg Opinion](https://www.bloomberg.com/opinion/articles/2024-08-27/great-stagnation-when-did-it-actually-begin?utm_source=website&utm_medium=share&utm_campaign=twitter&sref=htOHjx5Y).
